auth package¶

Submodules¶

auth.authenticate module¶

module manages authentication process with mqtt.

class auth.authenticate.Authenticator¶

Bases: object

Manages authentication using password and facial recognition.

authenticate_user_pass(self, username, password):

When user chooses to authenticate with password, this function will be used. Sends MP the username and password with location of the car.

authenticate_facialrecognition(self, username):

If user chooses facial recognition, it will request user picture from MP. user captures their face, runs facial recognition module and returns True/False.

authenticate_facialrecognition(username)¶

If user chooses facial recognition, it will request user picture from MP. user captures their face, runs facial recognition module and returns True/False.

authenticate_user_pass(username, password)¶

When user chooses to authenticate with password, this function will be used. Sends MP the username and password with location of the car.
